Gem Expo - international exhibition and event company
We believe that each event is a new opportunity for cooperation, development and promotion for our Customers. We strive to help our Clients improve their business.
Team over 17 years of experience

Developing the business projects of our Clients, GEM Expo exports its services to the most prestigious exhibition centers of the World and offers its Clients a comprehensive service around the World at the highest professional level

We are ready to develop and increase the success of our Clients together in exhibition, advertising,expo and event projects, which are based on a strong team of professionals, ambitious goals, modern technologies, where our satisfied Clients are our main motivation.

We will be glad to become your strategic Partner for Expo and Event projects in Russia.
